sv.title: Ny session med {{partner}}
sv.text: Partner {{partner}} har startat en ny session!

en.title: Event joined
en.text: You have joined the {{event}} with partner {{partner}}

sv.title: Spela event
sv.text: Du har gått med i {{event}} med partner {{partner}}

sv.title: Ny vän
sv.text: {{partner}} har lagt till dig som vän

en.title: Found a match
en.text: A session has started with {{partner}} - good luck!

sv.title: Partner hittad
sv.text: En session har startats med {{partner}} - lycka till!

en.title: Invited to play
en.text: {{partner}} invited you to play the event: {{event}}

sv.title: Inbjudan att spela
sv.text: {{partner}} har bjudit in dig att spela eventet: {{event}}

en.title: Invited accepted
en.text: {{partner}} has accepted your invite to play event: {{event}}

sv.title: Inbjudan att spela
sv.text: {{partner}} accepterat din inbjudan att spela eventet: {{event}}

en.title: Group invite
en.text: You have been invited to the group: {{group}}

sv.title: Gruppinbjudan
sv.text: Du har blivit inbjuden till gruppen: {{group}}

en.title: Added to group
en.text: You have been added to the group: {{group}}

sv.title: Tillagd i grupp
sv.text: Du har blivit tillagd i gruppen: {{group}}

en.title: Premium group member
en.text: You have been promoted to a premium member of the group: {{group}}

sv.title: Premium gruppmedlem
sv.text: Du har blivit premium i gruppen: {{group}}

en.title: Premium group member
en.text: You have been promoted to a premium member of the group: {{group}}

sv.title: Premium gruppmedlem
sv.text: Du har blivit premium i gruppen: {{group}}

en.title: New weekly reports
en.text: This week you completed {{dealsFinished}} deals with {{numberOfPartners}} partners and you averaged {{averageGrade}} stars!

sv.title: Nya veckorapporter
sv.text: Den här veckan bjöd du {{dealsFinished}} givar med {{numberOfPartners}} partners och du snittade {{averageGrade}} stjärnor!
